text: Allah noor hai aasmanon ka aur zamin ka uss kay noor ki misal misil aik taaq kay hai jiss mein chiragh ho aur chiragh seeshay ki qandeel mein ho aur seesha misil chamaktay huye roshan sitaray kay ho woh chiragh aik ba-barkat darakht zaitoon kay tel say jalaya jata ho jo darakht na mashriqi hai na maghribi khud woh tel qareeb hai kay aap hi roshni denay lagay agarcheh ussay aag na bhi chuye noor per noor hai Allah Taalaa apnay noor ki taraf rehnumaee kerta hai jissay chahaye logon (kay samjhaney) ko yeh misalen Allah Taalaa biyan farma raha hai aur Allah Taalaa her cheez kay haal say bakhoobi waqif hai
